nasauniverse1968385094101475789.content: At our hearts, we are seekers, and today we celebrate a scientific milestone!  Nearly 30 years after the first discovery of a world orbiting a Sun-like star beyond our solar system,  @NASA ’s Exoplanet Archive reached 6,000 confirmed exoplanets.    Read more:
